arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round Up: PSV defeats NAC as NEC punish RKC
arts.sum: There were four matches in the Eredivisie on Saturday and below is a round up of all the action. Groningen 1-0 Sparta Rotterdam Romano Postema scored the only goal as Groningen earned a much-needed victory over Sparta Rotterdam.
